Package fr.umlv.L3.classes.containers

Class Board

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.L3.classes.containers.Box
fr.umlv.L3.classes.containers.Board
public class Board
extends Box
Represent board game with a token Box, a HashMap for fireworks and an ArrayList for the discarded cards
